text: (Unibuke) umunsi tuzazura umuhamya wa buri muryango (Intumwa yawo) ubakomokamo, maze nawe (Muhamadi) tukakuzana uri umuhamya wabo (abahakanyi bo ku gihe cyawe). Twanaguhishuriye igitabo (Qur’an) gisobanura buri kintu, kikaba n’umuyoboro, impuhwe n’inkuru nziza ku bicishije bugufi (Abayisilamu)
